title: David Hannay, Baron Hannay of Chiswick - Wikipedia

quotes: in 1986 a Knight Commander (KCMG)
in 1995 a Knight Grand Cross (GCMG)
On 19 June 2001 he was created a life peer as Baron Hannay of Chiswick
He was pro-Chancellor of the University of Birmingham from 2001 to 2006
In 2003 he was made a Member of the Order of the Companions of Honour
Lord Hannay was awarded the honorary degree of Doctor of Letters by the University of Birmingham in 2003
He chaired the Board of United Nations Association UK from January 2006 to January 2011
